text: He muminasakala! Tomalokara purbe yisakalaka kitaba diya haiche sihamtara majata yisakale tomalokara dbinaka upahasa arau khela-dhemalira basturaupe grahana karae sihamtaka arau kaphirasakalaka tomaloke bandhuraupe grahana nakaraiba arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa, yadi tomaloke prakrta mumina
